column1: #text=There are six people living in my house , so going grocery shopping is usually a weekly occurrence .
#text=I do n't mind doing it though , because I like picking out what food to buy .
#text=I usually go on the morning with my sister .
#text=We get in the car and drive over to the closest grocery store which is about three miles away .
#text=We also take a list of items with us so we do n't forget what we need to buy .
#text=When we arrive at the store we park the car and get out .
#text=I will grab a shopping cart near the store entrance and then we go inside .
#text=We then take a look at our shopping list and begin gathering all the items .
#text=It takes us about 30 minutes to find everything .
#text=We then go to the checkout and pay for all the stuff .
#text=Then we go back to our car and drive home .
